title: What happened to PewDiePie’s wife Marzia Kjellberg on their romantic getaway?
text:
Marzia suffered an injury (Picture: PewDiePie/Instagram)

Marzia Kjellberg suffered a gruesome injury while on a second honeymoon with husband PewDiePie.

The pair jetted off to Japan, which is where they got engaged back in 2018.

However, in the midst of all that cuteness, Marzia had a bit of a mishap…

What happened to PewDiePie’s wife Marzia Kjellberg?

While away on their trip, Marzia, 26, had her toe badly cut by a knife which fell from its packaging as she opened it.

The social media star shared a picture of the offending knife with her followers, writing: ‘I was opening the packaging for this knife and it slid out and landed tip first vertically onto my bare toe. Not fun. Lots of blood.

The offending knife (Picture: itsmarziapie/Instagram)

‘Just a reminder to be careful while handling knives.’

Marzia then went on to soothe her concerned fans, saying: ‘Thank you all for worrying about the toe. It is a very dark purple colour near the cut, so it’s not looking pretty BUT I’ve been able to walk all day so I assume it’s not that serious. I’m hoping it will heal on its own.’

An update from Marzia (Picture: marziapie/Instagram)

It’s not all been doom and gloom, however, as Marzia has also been sharing some lovely pics of her trip in Tokyo with her YouTube star husband, whose real name is Felix Kjellberg.

Advertisement

Advertisement

A highlight has been Felix, 29, dancing and having a laugh with a Japanese street performer.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

The jet-set pair have gone on a second honeymoon to Japan after marrying in August following eight years spent together.

Their first honeymoon was in Bali, and we’re trying very hard not to be jealous.

description: Marzia Kjellberg suffered a gruesome injury while on a second honeymoon with husband PewDiePie.
